CustomField.description: To display the FSP Loan Id as Loan Number(Hyperlink) in List Views
CustomField.formula: IF($User.UIThemeDisplayed <> 'Theme3',IF(FSP_Loan_ID__c <> "", HYPERLINK('/'&Id, FSP_Loan_ID__c, '_self'), HYPERLINK('/'&Id, Name, '_self')), IF(FSP_Loan_ID__c <> "", HYPERLINK('/LendWithCareFSP/s/detail/'&Id, FSP_Loan_ID__c, '_self'), HYPERLINK('/LendWithCareFSP/s/detail/'&Id, Name, '_self')) )
CustomField.label: FSP Loan Number
